titles.title: A bill to strengthen participation of elected national legislators in the activities of the Organization of American States and reaffirm United States support for Organization of American States human rights and anti-corruption initiatives, and for other purposes.
Organization of American States Legislative Engagement Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
